channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Feds open probe into RFK Jr for allegedly decapitating a dead whale
item.description: The National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration is investigating Robert F Kennedy Jr. for a resurfaced story that he allegedly decapitating a whal...

item.title: Trump's focus on Haitian migrants in Springfield sounds alarm for voters in battleground state
item.description: Donald Trump and his running mate, Sen. J.D. Vance, are betting they have more to win than to lose by refusing to back off shocking claims about Haiti...

item.title: Proposed Judicial Rules Warped by Sheldon Whitehouse’s Pressure
item.description: When the judiciary makes rules of procedure, it shouldn’t endorse partisan attacks on the courts.

item.title: Expect Big Changes To U.S. Health Policies After The Election
item.description: If current trends continue, the typical American family will spend 40 percent of its income on health care by 2030.

item.title: Top Senate Democrat 'angry' over Biden-Harris admin 'stonewalling' after Trump assassination attempts

item.title: The Radical Norm at Elite Colleges

item.title: Bomb Threats Used By Media To Excuse Second Trump Assassination Attempt Have No ‘Validity At All’
item.description: Republican Gov. Mike DeWine confirmed Monday that all 33 bomb threats were hoaxes.

item.title: New Trump website reveals how much money a Harris presidency could cost taxpayers
item.description: The Trump campaign released a website Tuesday tabulating how much in increased taxes residents in each state can expect to pay if the 2017 tax cuts ex...

item.title: Pope Francis says both U.S. presidential candidates are 'against life,' urges vote for 'lesser evil'
item.description: Pope Francis laid into Donald Trump and Kamala Harris over the weekend, saying that neither U.S. presidential candidate is really pro-life.

item.title: Trading places, &c.
item.description: On protectionism, Donald Trump, Laura Loomer, Kamala Harris, Taylor Swift, James Earl Jones, and more.

item.title: After Woke ‘Star Wars’ Release, Ubisoft Stock Hits 9-Year Low
item.description: Adding race and sex politics to ‘Star Wars: Outlaws’ and ‘Assassin’s Creed: Shadows’ has not gone well for game maker Ubisoft.

item.title: Radio Nikki: Haley launching a weekly SiriusXM radio talk show at least through January
item.description: Former Republican presidential candidate Nikki Haley is launching her own radio talk show next week on SiriusXM that's set to air once a week at least...

item.title: Defense ‘Prioritization’ Is Not Enough
item.description: Prioritizing among the many threats our nation faces is important. But we must also rebuild our declining military.

item.title: If We Really Wanted Fewer School Shootings, We’d Work To End Divorce

item.title: Ohio governor says troopers to guard Springfield schools amid 'unfounded' bomb threats

item.title: Republicans Should Go from Trump’s ‘Concepts’ to Plan on Health Care
item.description: When Republicans don’t advance their own health-care policies, big-government progressives are happy to fill the void.

item.title: Constitution Day Reminds Us Equality Under The Law Is Fading In The West
item.description: In a constitutional America, there would be absolute protection of the people’s rights and equal justice under the law. That's not our reality today.
